data.text: @lavrys And he thinks he’s a centrist

@lavrys ✅The anti-vaxxer clown blocked me. LOL! #winning But he was trolling me! I guess he didn’t like the taste of his own medicine. 

✅And that kids is how you take down trolls and people out to disrupt. Introduce them to what they spew, call them out, don’t accept their asshatery. https://t.co/tB8VgJSbX3
@ScottinVictoria Why don't you click on the list, to meet your bot peers
@ScottinVictoria lol, OK Buckaroo Banzai, sure, whatever you say 😅😅
@Averyflash @lavrys I get that. Sounds like your mom was an amazing soul.
@ScottinVictoria @lavrys She loved mankind, hated people. Not ideal but I get it.

@ScottinVictoria @lavrys My mom was so curious about everything, when I was a kid in Yukon, I came home from school one day to find her in our kitchen talking politics to a Palestinian man who’d knocked on our door to sell carpets. I loved that, her interest in the world.

@Averyflash @lavrys Intellectual curiosity is so key to learning & it makes a people interesting! Without it, besides being & making one utterly boring, people can’t grow; and my-new-favourite-phrase, the “grim-forced-march school of hard lessons”, are well nigh impossible to navigate. Many don’t.
